Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.common.EventDispatcher
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.Player
public class Player extends EventDispatcher
Class dedicated to the storage of the player's data and available operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(String nickname, boolean inkwell, List<LeaderCard> leaders, Warehouse warehouse, Strongbox strongbox, ResourceTransactionRecipe baseProduction, int devSlotsCount, PlayerSetup setup)
      Initializes player's attributes.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player's nickname to be seen by all the players
      inkwell - received only by the first player
      leaders - the leader cards in the player's hand
      warehouse - the player's warehouse
      strongbox - the player's strongbox
      baseProduction - the player's base production
      devSlotsCount - number of possible production slots that can be occupied by development cards

  • Method Details

    • getNickname

      public String getNickname()
      Getter of the player's visible nickname.
      Returns:
      the player's nickname

    • hasInkwell

      public boolean hasInkwell()
      Checks whether the player has the inkwell, i.e. the player starts first at each round.
      Returns:
      true if this player starts first; false otherwise.

    • getLeaders

      public List<LeaderCard> getLeaders()
      Getter of the hand of leader cards available to the player.
      Returns:
      the list of leader cards

    • retainLeaders

      public void retainLeaders​(View view, List<LeaderCard> leaders) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • discardLeader

      public void discardLeader​(View view, Game game, LeaderCard leader) throws IllegalArgumentException, ActiveLeaderDiscardException
      Action performed when the player discards a leader card.
      Parameters:
      game - the game the player is playing in
      leader - the leader card to discard
      Throws:
      ActiveLeaderDiscardException - leader is already active
      IllegalArgumentException - leader isn't owned by the player

    • incrementFaithPoints

      public void incrementFaithPoints​(Game game, int points)
      Advances the faith marker by one on the board's faith track, then proceeds to call a checker for Vatican report tiles "onIncrementFaithPoints".
      Parameters:
      game - the game the player is playing in
      points - the quantity to be added to the faith points

    • discardResources

      public void discardResources​(Game game, int quantity)
      Discards resources.
      Parameters:
      game - the game the player is playing in
      quantity - the quantity of resources to discard

    • getWarehouse

      public Warehouse getWarehouse()
      Requires access to the Warehouse of the player.
      Returns:
      the player's Warehouse

    • getStrongbox

      public Strongbox getStrongbox()
      Requires access to the Strongbox of the player.
      Returns:
      the player's Strongbox

    • getDevSlots

      public List<Stack<DevelopmentCard>> getDevSlots()
      Retrieves the stacks of cards bought and stored in the slots.
      Returns:
      the player's development slots

    • getFaithPoints

      public int getFaithPoints()
      Returns the position of the player's faith marker.
      Returns:
      the number of the tile reached by the player

    • getVictoryPoints

      public int getVictoryPoints()
      Returns the number of victory points have been scored so far by the player.
      Returns:
      the current player score

    • incrementVictoryPoints

      public void incrementVictoryPoints​(int points)
      Increments score of the player by a given quantity.
      Parameters:
      points - the quantity to be added to the score

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Checks whether the player is connected to the current game.
      Returns:
      true if the player is online; false otherwise.

    • setActive

      public void setActive​(boolean active)
      Changes the state of connection of a player, in case of (dis)connection.
      Parameters:
      active - the updated state of connection of the player

    • isWinner

      public boolean isWinner()
      Says whether this player has won the game or not.
      Returns:
      true if this player is winner of the game; false otherwise.

    • setWinner

      public void setWinner()
      Declares the winner, by setting the winner flag.

    • addToDevSlot

      public void addToDevSlot​(Game game, int devSlotIndex, DevelopmentCard devCard, Map<ResourceContainer,​Map<ResourceType,​Integer>> resContainers) throws IllegalCardDepositException, IllegalResourceTransactionReplacementsException, IllegalResourceTransactionContainersException, IllegalResourceTransferException
      Places a new card on top of a given production slot and consume required resources.
      Parameters:
      game - the game the player is playing in
      devSlotIndex - the destination production slot
      devCard - the development card that has just been bought
      resContainers - a map of the resource containers where to take the storable resources
      Throws:
      IllegalCardDepositException - blocks the action if the level of the previous top card of the slot is not equal to current level minus 1
      IllegalResourceTransferException - if the player cannot pay for the card
      IllegalResourceTransactionReplacementsException
      IllegalResourceTransactionContainersException

    • getBaseProduction

      public ResourceTransactionRecipe getBaseProduction()
      Obtains the base production "recipe" in order to activate a production in it.
      Returns:
      the required base production recipe

    • getResourcesCount

      public int getResourcesCount()
      Obtains how many resources the player has.
      Returns:
      the total number of resources the player has available

      public PlayerSetup getSetup()
